verse.name: v1
verse.lines: What various hindrances we meet in coming to the mercy seat! Yet who that knows the worth of pray'r but wishes to be often there!

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: Have you no words? Ah, think again: words flow apace when you complain, and fill a fellow-creature’s ear with the sad tale of all your care.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Were half the breath thus vainly spent to heav’n in supplication sent, our cheerful song would oft’ner be, "Hear what the Lord hath done for me!"
